# Intelligent Waitlist

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/calendar/intelligent-waitlist/

## Category
02 Calendar And Appointments

## Subcategory
Intelligent Waitlist

## Article Content

HOME
CALENDAR & APPOINTMENTS
INTELLIGENT WAITLIST
Intelligent Waitlist

Our Intelligent Waitlist allows you to keep track of clients who couldn't fit on the calendar, receive a notification when an opening becomes available, and easily book using pre-filled client information.

To enable the Intelligent Waitlist app, go to Apps > Manage apps > Intelligent Waitlist and select Enable.

To learn more about the Intelligent Waitlist, watch our on-demand Intelligent Waitlist video.

The articles in this section cover the Intelligent Waitlist, including adding waitlist entries, booking appointments from the waitlist, and more.

In this section:
Viewing the Waitlist
Adding and Finding Waitlist Entries
Allowing Clients to Join Waitlist in Online Booking
Booking an Appointment from the Waitlist
Setting Up Waitlist Automated Messages
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
